name: RangeBorderCollection
description: Represents the border objects that make up range border.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: count
properties.description: Number of border objects in the collection.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Gets a border object using its name

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index value of the border object to be retrieved.

methods.name: getItemAt
methods.description: Gets a border object using its index

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index value of the object to be retrieved. Zero-indexed.
